languages.text: Опустевшая оболочка демонического орудия. Именно это создание — ужасающая смесь технологий реального мира и безумных сил варпа — исказила работу корабельных систем и разумы техножрецов.

The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.
languages.original_text: Опустевшая оболочка демонического орудия. Именно это создание — ужасающая смесь технологий реального мира и безумных сил варпа — исказила работу корабельных систем и разумы техножрецов.

traits.locale_text: The empty shell of a demonic weapon. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of real-world technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

The empty shell of a demonic weapon. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of real-world technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

The empty shell of a demonic weapon. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of real-world technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

languages.text: El cascarón vacío de un ingenio daemónico. Ha sido esta creación, una espantosa mezcla de tecnología del espacio real y de los desquiciados poderes de la disformidad, la que ha interferido en los sistemas de la nave y trastornado las mentes de los tecnosacerdotes.
languages.original_text: The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

traits.locale_text: El cascarón vacío de un arma demoníaca. Ha sido esta creación, una espantosa mezcla de tecnología del espacio real y de los desquiciados poderes de la disformidad, la que ha interferido en los sistemas de la nave y trastornado las mentes de los tecnosacerdotes.

languages.text: 一台恶魔引擎的空壳，由真实世界的技术与亚空间的狂乱之力扭结而成。正是这件造物破坏了飞船的系统，扭曲了那些技术神甫的思想。
languages.original_text: The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

traits.locale_text: 某件恶魔武器的空壳，由现实世界的技术与亚空间的狂乱之力扭结而成。正是这件造物破坏了飞船的系统，扭曲了那些技术祭司的思想。

languages.text: 中身が入っていない魔導兵器だ。犯人はこの創作物だったのだ…リアルスペース技術と<歪み>の狂気の力を混ぜた恐ろしいソレ…これこそが宇宙船のシステムを混乱させて、技術司祭の精神を歪ませた。
languages.original_text: The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

traits.locale_text: 中身が入っていない悪魔の武器だ。犯人はこの創作物だったのだ…リアルスペース技術と<歪み>の狂気の力を混ぜた恐ろしいソレ…これこそが宇宙船のシステムを混乱させて、技術司祭の精神を歪ませた。

languages.text: Die leere Hülle einer Dämonenmaschine. Es war diese Kreation – eine entsetzliche Kombination aus Technologien des Materiums und der umnachteten Kräfte des Warps – die die Systeme des Schiffs gestört und den Verstand der Techpriester verdorben hat.
languages.original_text: The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

traits.locale_text: Die leere Hülle einer dämonischen Waffe. Es war diese Kreation – eine entsetzliche Kombination aus Technologien des Materiums und der umnachteten Kräfte des Warps – die die Systeme des Schiffs gestört und den Verstand der Techpriester verdorben hat.

languages.text: L'enveloppe vide d'une machine-démon. C'est cette création, un mélange horrifiant de technologies de l'espace réel et des pouvoirs dérangés du Warp, qui a perturbé les systèmes du vaisseau et altéré l'esprit des technoprêtres.
languages.original_text: The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

traits.locale_text: L'enveloppe vide d'une arme démoniaque. C'est cette création, un mélange horrifiant de technologies de l'espace réel et des pouvoirs dérangés du Warp, qui a perturbé les systèmes du vaisseau et altéré l'esprit des technoprêtres.

languages.text: Bir İblis Motoru'nun boş kılıfı. Gerçekuzay teknolojilerinin öteboyut güçleriyle birleşiminden oluşan bu korkunç alet, geminin sistemlerini bozmuş ve Tekno Rahiplerin zihinlerini zehirlemişti.
languages.original_text: The empty shell of a Daemon Engine. It was this creation — a horrifying mix of realspace technologies and the deranged powers of the warp — that disrupted the ship's systems and twisted the Tech-Priests' minds.

traits.locale_text: Bir İblis Motoru'nun boş kılıfı. Gerçekuzay teknolojilerinin öteboyut güçleriyle birleşiminden oluşan bu korkunç alet, geminin sistemlerini bozmuş ve Tekno Rahiplerin zihinlerini zehirlemişti.
